item.title: üèÜ Outstanding Presentation Award for Young Researchers
item.description: I was honored to receive the Outstanding Presentation Award for Young Researchers from the for my presentation, “A Proposal of Selection Guideline for Geographical SMR Protocols Using Communication Pattern-based Response Time Models,” at held at Hakodate Arena from August 2 to August 4, 2023. This award recognizes outstanding presentations by researchers under the age of 33 during conferences held between June 1 and May 31 of the following year.

item.title: Selection Guidelines for Geographical SMR Protocols: A Communication Pattern-based Latency Modeling Approach
üíµ Grant: JASSO Exchange Student Support Program
item.description: I studied at the Technical University of Munich through the for six months, from September 2024 to February 2025. During this exchange, I received a scholarship totaling 610,000 yen from the . This scholarship included a monthly stipend of 80,000 yen (for six months) and an additional 130,000 yen for travel expenses.

üíµ Grant: Overseas Training Support for Graduate Students
item.description: I studied at the Technical University of Munich as part of the , from September 2024 to February 2025. This exchange was supported by the , funded by the , which provided 300,000 yen. This scholarship is designed for graduate students with strong academic performance and exemplary character, particularly those with ties to the Aichi Higashi-Mikawa region.

üíµ Grant: Toyohashi University of Technology Overseas Trainee Scholarship
item.description: I participated in a training program in Malaysia through the at Toyohashi University of Technology from January 4 to February 25, 2023. I received a grant of 200,000 yen through the Toyohashi University of Technology Overseas Trainee Scholarship Program. This scholarship is awarded to a limited number of students based on their academic performance and interview results.

item.title: Development of a Store Evaluation System Using an Image Caption Generation Model
